content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: observer
inventory=[{"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 9, "index": 14}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 6, "index": 16}, {"type": "wheat_seeds", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "cut_red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 55, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft an observer, I first need to craft a redstone. To do that, I need to move the redstone_block from slot 10 to the crafting grid (eg., slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: observer
inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 9, "index": 14}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 6, "index": 16}, {"type": "wheat_seeds", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "cut_red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 55, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I can craft the redstone by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9
